name: superadmin
description: Superadmin can access and manage everything in the system

name: admin
description: Admin has extensive access but less than superadmin

name: vendor
description: Vendors can manage their own products and view their sales reports

name: customer
description: Customers can browse products, place orders, and manage their own accounts

name: guest
description: Guests can browse products but need to create an account to place orders
